4689.quoteText:
You do not have to give your personal or legal name to create an npm
account.
You can use a pseudonym instead.

4723.quoteText:
npm does not respond to the
Do Not Track HTTP header.
4723.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

4724.quoteText: >Nothing in this Agreement gives npm any ownership rights in intellectual property that you share with npm Services, such as your Account information or any Packages you share with npm Services (Your Content).

4725.quoteText: You decide whether and how to license it.

4726.quoteText:

representatives, and agents, and hold them harmless for, all liability,
